validated_signals.description: 50% fee_ph_pctrank365 + 50% mvrv_pctrank365, 1-day publication lag, soft scaler at alpha=1.0
validated_signals.verdict: VALIDATED — use as soft scaler on champion portfolio before OOS evaluation

null_results.description: Daily regime-aware Donchian — HMM and vol regime overlays on daily BTC Donchian
null_results.reason: DSR never exceeded 0.95 at N=1552+. Statistical bar too high for daily data resolution. 2022 bear is structural for long-only.
null_results.recommendation: Do not continue daily-data regime sweeps. Use hourly data for more statistical power.

null_results.description: XGBoost on hourly feature matrix — 23-88 features, gradient boosted classification
null_results.reason: 52.9% accuracy. Feature expansion 58->88 features did not achieve statistical significance.
null_results.recommendation: Feature engineering needs fundamentally different approach, not more features of the same type.

null_results.description: Kelly criterion sizing on meta-labeled Donchian — calibrated and uncalibrated variants
null_results.reason: Meta-model accuracy 56% makes Kelly bets tiny. Edge is in trade filtering, not probability-based sizing. Platt calibration collapses probability spread (std=0.032).
null_results.recommendation: Kelly requires higher accuracy meta-models. Use inverse_vol sizing instead.

null_results.description: ETH Bollinger Band strategies on 4h timeframe
null_results.reason: Dominated by Donchian on all metrics. Not a competitive standalone signal type for ETH. Not exhaustively swept — dominated early in exploration.
null_results.recommendation: Do not pursue Bollinger as primary signal for ETH.

null_results.verdict: NOT SIGNIFICANT - p=0.467, IC=0.018. Exchange flows at daily resolution are not predictive.

null_results.description: NVT ratio (market cap / tx volume) 90d z-score from CoinMetrics
null_results.verdict: NOT SIGNIFICANT - p=0.514. NVT derived from CM columns (CapMrktCurUSD/TxCnt*Price) uninformative.
NOT SIGNIFICANT - p=0.451. Short 30d window too noisy. Use 90d window instead.

null_results.description: Binary gate on Donchian using on-chain composite > 0
null_results.verdict: DEGRADES Donchian performance. Composite has predictive IC but does not improve strategy Sharpe when used as hard binary gate. Use as continuous sizer instead.
NOT SIGNIFICANT - Blockchain.com transaction counts not predictive at daily resolution. BC hash rate mirrors CoinMetrics exactly.

null_results.description: S002 composite (0.25*mvrv_std + 0.75*(-hr_lag30_std)) used standalone as long-only strategy
null_results.verdict: Cannot use as primary signal — Sharpe < B&H. Composite must overlay existing price signals.
NOT SIGNIFICANT - ROC form loses signal. Use raw LEVEL of fee_per_hash (IC=0.259***) or pctrank (IC=0.166***). ROC form peaks at lag=30-45d (IC=0.12) which is marginally useful.

null_results.description: MVRV z-score hard gate — only trade when mvrv_z90 < 2.0
null_results.verdict: Severely degrades Donchian performance. MVRV gate restricts too much (only 20% active). Use MVRV as soft scaler at most.

null_results.description: Hard gate on champion portfolio (BTC 30% + ETH 70%) using fee_ph_pctrank365 > threshold
null_results.verdict: Hard gate degrades portfolio Sharpe (0.98 vs 1.545). 2021 bull run has fee_pctrank=0.29 avg — gate cuts best year. Always use soft scaling (alpha>0) not hard threshold.

null_results.description: MVRV z90 > thresh filter on BTC leg of champion portfolio
null_results.verdict: Modest improvement (+0.014 Sharpe) at most. Not worth complexity. MVRV identifies overbought only 7.8% of 8h bars — too rare to make meaningful difference.
